event.description: Manuel Margot walks.
Wil Myers strikes out swinging.
Yangervis Solarte grounds into a double play, third baseman Justin Turner to second baseman Logan Forsythe to first baseman Adrian Gonzalez. Manuel Margot out at 2nd.
Hunter Renfroe called out on strikes.
Ryan Schimpf pops out to catcher Yasmani Grandal in foul territory.
Austin Hedges walks.
Erick Aybar grounds into a force out, shortstop Corey Seager to second baseman Logan Forsythe. Austin Hedges out at 2nd.
Trevor Cahill grounds out, shortstop Corey Seager to first baseman Adrian Gonzalez.
Travis Jankowski called out on strikes.
Manuel Margot strikes out swinging.
Wil Myers singles on a sharp ground ball to center fielder Joc Pederson.
Yangervis Solarte flies out to center fielder Joc Pederson.
With Hunter Renfroe batting, Wil Myers picked off and caught stealing 2nd base, pitcher Rich Hill to first baseman Adrian Gonzalez to second baseman Logan Forsythe.
Hunter Renfroe homers (1) on a fly ball to left center field.
Ryan Schimpf strikes out swinging.
Austin Hedges grounds out, shortstop Corey Seager to first baseman Adrian Gonzalez.
Erick Aybar walks.
Trevor Cahill out on a sacrifice bunt to first baseman Adrian Gonzalez. Erick Aybar to 2nd.
Travis Jankowski flies out to left fielder Andrew Toles.
Pitching Change: Sergio Romo replaces Rich Hill, batting 9th.
Manuel Margot lines out to left fielder Andrew Toles.
Wil Myers hits a ground-rule double (1) on a line drive .
Yangervis Solarte flies out sharply to center fielder Joc Pederson. Wil Myers to 3rd.
Hunter Renfroe grounds out, third baseman Justin Turner to first baseman Adrian Gonzalez.
Pitching Change: Alex Wood replaces Sergio Romo, batting 9th, replacing Chase Utley.
Ryan Schimpf called out on strikes.
Austin Hedges grounds out sharply, second baseman Logan Forsythe to first baseman Adrian Gonzalez.
Erick Aybar lines out to right fielder Yasiel Puig.
Scott Van Slyke remains in the game as the left fielder.
Offensive Substitution: Pinch-hitter Luis Sardinas replaces Jose Torres.
Luis Sardinas grounds out, shortstop Corey Seager to first baseman Adrian Gonzalez.
Travis Jankowski walks.
Manuel Margot pops out to shortstop Corey Seager.
Wil Myers flies out to center fielder Joc Pederson.
Pitching Change: Kenley Jansen replaces Alex Wood, batting 9th.
Yangervis Solarte grounds out to first baseman Adrian Gonzalez.
Hunter Renfroe strikes out swinging.
Ryan Schimpf grounds out softly, first baseman Adrian Gonzalez to pitcher Kenley Jansen.
Andrew Toles strikes out swinging.
Corey Seager doubles (1) on a sharp line drive to left fielder Travis Jankowski.
Justin Turner pops out to second baseman Yangervis Solarte.
Adrian Gonzalez hits a ground-rule double (2) on a line drive . Corey Seager scores.
Logan Forsythe reaches on a missed catch error by first baseman Wil Myers, assist to third baseman Ryan Schimpf. Adrian Gonzalez scores.
Joc Pederson strikes out swinging, catcher Austin Hedges to first baseman Wil Myers.
Yasmani Grandal flies out sharply to right fielder Hunter Renfroe.
Yasiel Puig grounds out sharply, shortstop Erick Aybar to first baseman Wil Myers.
Rich Hill hit by pitch.
Andrew Toles grounds out sharply to first baseman Wil Myers.
Corey Seager strikes out swinging.
Justin Turner lines out to left fielder Travis Jankowski.
Adrian Gonzalez walks.
Logan Forsythe strikes out swinging.
Joc Pederson walks.
Yasmani Grandal grounds into a double play, third baseman Ryan Schimpf to shortstop Erick Aybar to first baseman Wil Myers. Joc Pederson out at 2nd.
Yasiel Puig homers (1) on a fly ball to left field.
Rich Hill strikes out swinging.
Andrew Toles walks.
Corey Seager strikes out swinging.
Justin Turner singles on a ground ball to left fielder Travis Jankowski. Andrew Toles to 2nd.
Adrian Gonzalez flies out to right fielder Hunter Renfroe. Andrew Toles to 3rd.
Logan Forsythe strikes out on a foul tip.
Joc Pederson grounds out, pitcher Trevor Cahill to first baseman Wil Myers.
Yasmani Grandal grounds out sharply, second baseman Yangervis Solarte to first baseman Wil Myers.
Yasiel Puig singles on a ground ball to shortstop Erick Aybar.
Offensive Substitution: Pinch-hitter Chase Utley replaces Sergio Romo.
Pitching Change: Jose Torres replaces Trevor Cahill, batting 8th.
Chase Utley called out on strikes.
Offensive Substitution: Pinch-hitter Scott Van Slyke replaces Andrew Toles.
Scott Van Slyke strikes out swinging.
Corey Seager strikes out swinging.
Justin Turner doubles (3) on a fly ball to right fielder Hunter Renfroe.
With Adrian Gonzalez batting, Justin Turner steals (1) 3rd base.
Adrian Gonzalez grounds out, second baseman Yangervis Solarte to first baseman Wil Myers.
Pitching Change: Miguel Diaz replaces Jose Torres, batting 8th, replacing Luis Sardinas.
Logan Forsythe strikes out swinging.
Pitching Change: Ryan Buchter replaces Miguel Diaz, batting 8th.
Joc Pederson called out on strikes.
Yasmani Grandal pops out to catcher Austin Hedges in foul territory.
